docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v2 is currently in development and is not the default version. You may use v2 by either passing ‘version=2’ in the Accept Header or entering api/v2/ in the URL.

methods.name: create

params.name: ip
params.description: not required if using a subnet with dhcp proxy

params.name: mac
params.description: not required if its a virtual machine

params.name: progress_report_id
params.description: UUID to track orchestration tasks status, GET /api/orchestration/:UUID/tasks

examples:
POST /api/hosts
{
  "host": {
    "name": "testhost11",
    "environment_id": "334344675",
    "domain_id": "22495316",
    "ip": "10.0.0.20",
    "mac": "52:53:00:1e:85:93",
    "architecture_id": "501905019",
    "operatingsystem_id": "1073012828",
    "puppet_proxy_id": "980190962",
    "compute_resource_id": "980190962"
  }
}
